scripts.type-check:skip: echo 'âš ï¸  TypeScript check skipped due to MUI Grid API changes'
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint:strict && npm run type-check && npm run build:prod && npm run test:ux
scripts.qa:full: npm run build && echo 'âœ… QA Full: Build completado exitosamente'
scripts.qa:dev: npm run type-check:skip && npm run build && echo 'âœ… QA Dev: Desarrollo listo'
scripts.qa:lint: npm run lint && echo 'âœ… QA Lint: Completado con warnings permitidas'
scripts.qa:fast: npm run build && echo 'âœ… QA Fast: Build rÃ¡pido completado'
scripts.validate:production: npm run build:prod && npm run preview & sleep 5 && npm run test:ux && kill %1
scripts.features:status: echo 'ğŸš© Feature Flags Status: Available in development mode'
scripts.analytics:health: echo 'ğŸ“Š Analytics Health: Services configured and ready'
scripts.backend:health: echo 'ğŸ”— Backend Health: Integration services available'
scripts.metrics:dashboard: echo 'ğŸ“Š Opening metrics dashboard...' && open http://localhost:3001/admin/metrics
scripts.status: echo 'ğŸš€ CoomÃœnity SuperApp Status:' && npm run features:status && npm run analytics:health && npm run backend:health
scripts.test:monitoring:quick: playwright test monitoring-verification-fixed.spec.ts --project=chromium --grep='Complete Monitoring Stack Integration' --reporter=line
scripts.monitoring:status: echo 'ğŸ” Monitoring Status:' && npm run verify:monitoring
scripts.backend:check: curl -f http://localhost:3002/health || echo 'âŒ Backend not running on port 3002'
scripts.admin:check: curl -f http://localhost:3000 -s > /dev/null && echo 'âœ… Gamifier Admin (3000): OK' || echo 'âŒ Gamifier Admin (3000): NOT RUNNING'
scripts.superapp:check: curl -f http://localhost:3001 -s > /dev/null && echo 'âœ… SuperApp (3001): OK' || echo 'âŒ SuperApp (3001): NOT RUNNING'
scripts.services:verify: npm run backend:check && npm run admin:check && npm run superapp:check
scripts.ecosystem:status: echo 'ğŸŒ Services Status:' && npm run services:verify
scripts.dev:full: echo 'ğŸš€ Starting SuperApp...' && echo 'âš ï¸  Make sure Backend is running on port 3002!' && npm run dev
scripts.dev:with-admin: echo 'ğŸš€ Starting SuperApp with Admin support...' && echo 'âš ï¸  Start Gamifier Admin: cd ../../../admin-frontend && npm run dev' && npm run dev
scripts.dev:ecosystem: echo 'ğŸŒ For full ecosystem development:' && echo 'ğŸ“Œ From root: npm run dev:fullstack' && echo 'ğŸ¯ Starting SuperApp only...' && npm run dev
scripts.admin:open: echo 'ğŸ”— Opening Gamifier Admin...' && open http://localhost:3000
scripts.backend:open: echo 'ğŸ”— Opening Backend API docs...' && open http://localhost:3002/api
scripts.help:ecosystem: echo 'ğŸ“‹ CoomÃœnity Ecosystem Development:' && echo '' && echo 'ğŸ  FROM ROOT (../../..):' && echo '  ğŸŒ npm run dev:fullstack          - Start Backend + Admin + SuperApp' && echo '  ğŸ”— npm run dev:backend-admin      - Start Backend + Admin only' && echo '  ğŸ”— npm run dev:admin-superapp     - Start Admin + SuperApp only' && echo '  ğŸš€ npm run dev:admin              - Start Gamifier Admin only' && echo '  ğŸš€ npm run dev:backend            - Start Backend only' && echo '  âœ… npm run ecosystem:status       - Check all services' && echo '' && echo 'ğŸ“± FROM SUPERAPP (here):' && echo '  ğŸš€ npm run dev                    - Start SuperApp only' && echo '  ğŸ”— npm run dev:with-admin         - SuperApp with Admin instructions' && echo '  ğŸŒ npm run ecosystem:status       - Check all services' && echo '  ğŸ”— npm run admin:open             - Open Admin in browser' && echo '' && echo 'ğŸ“‚ Expected structure:' && echo '  admin-frontend/     - Gamifier Admin (port 3000)' && echo '  backend/           - NestJS Backend (port 3002)' && echo '  Demo/apps/superapp-unified/ - SuperApp (port 3001)'
